text: The store is going downhill rapidly. I think I'm going to start going to Merrillville store to pick up my pizza from now on. Was going to have it delivered but their delivery time this evening was over 2 hours again. Forget about curbside …More

text: I ordered a dinner box through the phone for pickup. I asked for cheese sticks but didn’t get them and the pizza was discombobulated. The pizza was good though.

text: Pizza was an hour late and I got an attitude from the person that answered the phone. I will never order from them again and I will be deleting the app. Pizza was cold and all over the box.

text: They are normally on point. But they messed up my order and the driver had to come back 3 times. The third time they didn't even bring everything. I was on lunch break so had no more time to wait for them to come back. Great food, just need to pay more attention to what's going out

text: Unsanitary place.  The floor was sticky, an employee was sitting in a booth eating lunch as I walked in and got up to take my order.  As I waited for my pizza, couldn't help but notice how unkempt and grimy the kitchen looked.  The walls …More
